name: Twister Run
description:
Twister Run Trijam 154 Submission: Theme - there is a twist!

I couldn't think of a good twist, but a twister/tornado came to mind, and I wanted to make an endless runner.  The jump needs more tweaking and so does the spawner, but I'm glad I was able to throw together something that was somewhat functional in the time frame.

2 hours 57 min development time

Made in Godot Engine

Instructions:

Press space or the up arrow key to jump

Credits: assets taken from OpenGameArt.org

https://opengameart.org/content/bevouliin-trees-in-the-mist-game-background

https://opengameart.org/content/tornado

https://opengameart.org/content/wind-music-futuristic-atmospheric
